name: Neon Strike
description: Neon Strike is a 3D first person shooter which places the player in a Cyberpunk-like environment in which they fight for survival in a desperate attempt to escape a prison complex. Fighting his way out of the prison complex, the hero is armed only with a pistol and a few grenades which he manages to steal when breaking out. He must arm himself with whatever weapons he can find if he has any hopes of making it past the killer android guards that patrol the complex, who are programmed with orders to kill any prisoners seen on sight.
